title: Late for Hallowe'en
description: Judy finds that a witch called Murgatroyd and her cat, Hornsbydale, have made their home in the garden shrubbery. The little girl accepts these newcomers as friends, although she has to put up with their quick tempers. Murgatroyd's spells, some good and some bad, fill Judy's days-and some nights, too-with excitement and wonder.She finds herself in danger when the witches gather for their annual Hallowe'en celebration. Fortunately, she has been taught enough magic so that she can protect herself, and her teacher is the handsome dragon who was brought to life from off a painted tray. He takes her on a strange and wonderful adventure...
author: Camilla Fegan
